title: White Hot Anger (with Simon Hoare MP)
itunes:title: White Hot Anger (with Simon Hoare MP)
description:
As the Met launches an investigation into Downing Street parties, Conservative MP Simon Hoare says there's 'white hot anger, there is bewilderment, and there is huge disappointment' among his constituents. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker it's looking 'increasingly gloomy and increasingly difficult' for Boris Johnson to stay on. Plus: Following Nusrat Ghani's Islamophobia claims, how widespread is the problem? We get the view of Alba Kapoor from the Runnymede Trust.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
As the Met launches an investigation into Downing Street parties, Conservative MP Simon Hoare says there's 'white hot anger, there is bewilderment, and there is huge disappointment' among his constituents. Plus: Following Nusrat Ghani's Islamophobia claims, how widespread is the problem? We get the view of Alba Kapoor from the Runnymede Trust.
